mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, m.* from (select * from member order by 1 desc) m) where rnum between #{start} and #{end} order by 1 desc
select * from (select rownum as rnum, d.* from (select * from del_member order by 1 desc) d) where rnum between #{start} and #{end} order by 1 desc

select * from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select c.*, (select m.member_id from member m where m.member_no = c.member_no) as member_id from community c order by 1 desc) r) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select c.*, (select m.member_id from member m where m.member_no = c.member_no) as member_id from comment_tbl c order by 1 desc) r) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select * from ads where ads_type = #{adsType} order by 1

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE member_level = 2) AS member_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE member_level = 1) AS admin_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM del_member) AS del_member_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE warning_level = 3) AS kick_member_count FROM dual
mapper.insert: insert into del_member values(#{m.memberNo}, #{m.memberId}, #{m.memberEmail}, #{m.joinDate}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), null, #{adminId})
mapper.select: select goods_category, sum(s.goods_total_price) as category_total_price from sell s join goods g on s.goods_no = g.goods_no group by goods_category order by goods_category
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sell, goods_name FROM sell GROUP BY goods_name ORDER BY total_sell DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

WITH date_range AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sale_date FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ), sales_data AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(sell_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sale_date, SUM(goods_total_price) AS total_day_price FROM sell WHERE sell_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 6 AND sell_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE) + 1 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(sell_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) SELECT d.sale_date, NVL(s.total_day_price, 0) AS total_day_price FROM date_range d LEFT JOIN sales_data s ON d.sale_date = s.sale_date ORDER BY d.sale_date

WITH base_date AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AS month_start, LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) AS month_end FROM dual ), date_range AS ( SELECT GREATEST(NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 7, '월') + (LEVEL - 1) * 7, (SELECT month_start FROM base_date)) AS week_start_date, LEAST(NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 7, '월') + (LEVEL - 1) * 7 + 6, (SELECT month_end FROM base_date)) AS week_end_date FROM dual CONNECT BY NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 7, '월') + (LEVEL - 1) * 7 <= (SELECT month_end FROM base_date) ), sales_data AS ( SELECT TRUNC(sell_date) AS sell_day, SUM(goods_total_price) AS daily_price FROM sell WHERE sell_date BETWEEN (SELECT month_start FROM base_date) AND (SELECT month_end FROM base_date) GROUP BY TRUNC(sell_date) ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY dr.week_start_date) AS week_no, TO_CHAR(dr.week_start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS week_start, TO_CHAR(dr.week_end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS week_end, NVL(( SELECT SUM(sd.daily_price) FROM sales_data sd WHERE sd.sell_day BETWEEN dr.week_start_date AND dr.week_end_date ), 0) AS total_week_price FROM date_range dr ORDER BY dr.week_start_date
mapper.update: update member set member_id = #{newMemberId}, del_status = 'Y' where member_no = #{memberNo}
